DOC.detailed_description: A 52-week , double-blind , randomised , multi-centre , parallel-group , Phase III study patient 12 year old asthma , evaluate efficacy safety Symbicort® ( budesonide/formoterol ) Turbuhaler® 160/4.5 μg 'as need ' compare terbutaline Turbuhaler® 0.4 mg 'as need ' Pulmicort® ( budesonide ) Turbuhaler® 200 μg twice daily plus terbutaline Turbuhaler® 0.4 mg 'as need '
